g every 15 minutes for the fi  rst two hours: 
/lozenge6  General condition, blood pressure and pulse
/lozenge6  Vaginal bleeding
/lozenge6  Uterus, to make sure that it is well contracted.
/circle6 Dispose of the placenta in the correct, safe and culturally appropriate manner. Use gloves 
while handling the placenta. Put the placenta into a leak-proof bag containing bleach. 
Incinerate the placenta or bury it at least 10 metres away from a source of water in a pit 
that is 2 metres deep. 
/circ
